--- select_singer_with_single_column_subquery_with_at.sql
SELECT (
  SELECT FirstName
  FROM Singers LIMIT 100
) AS FN

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Alias{
        Expr: &parser.ScalarSubQuery{
          pos:   7,
          end:   54,
          Query: &parser.Select{
            pos:      11,
            Distinct: false,
            AsStruct: false,
            Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
              &parser.ExprSelectItem{
                Expr: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  18,
                  end:  27,
                  Name: "FirstName",
                },
              },
            },
            From: &parser.From{
              pos:    30,
              Source: &parser.TableName{
                Table: &parser.Ident{
                  pos:  35,
                  end:  42,
                  Name: "Singers",
                },
                Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
                As:     (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
                Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
              },
            },
            Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
            GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
            Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
            OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
            Limit:   &parser.Limit{
              pos:   43,
              Count: &parser.IntLiteral{
                pos:   49,
                end:   52,
                Base:  10,
                Value: "100",
              },
              Offset: (*parser.Offset)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
        As: &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   55,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  58,
            end:  60,
            Name: "FN",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*parser.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (SELECT FirstName FROM Singers LIMIT 100) AS FN
